TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IDesignerGlyphProvider

Attribute.AttributeName: [System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")]
[<System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")>]

summary.span: 定义标志符号提供程序类用于生成在活动设计器上显示的标志符号数组的方法。

span.span: Defines the method that glyph provider classes use to generate an array of glyphs to display on an activity designer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 此接口定义了一个方法，实现类必须使用该方法，来为活动设计器提供一组适当的 对象。This interface defines the method that implementing classes must use to provide an appropriate set of objects to activity designers. 此外，实现类还应在 对象上呈现 对象。The implementing class should also render the objects onto the object. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现 接口。The following code example demonstrates how you can implement the interface. 本示例演示如何实现 方法，以便在活动设计器图面上绘制自定义标志符号对象。It shows how you can implement the method to draw custom glyph objects on an activity designer surface. 此代码示例摘自工作流监视器 SDK 示例中的 DesignerGlyphProvider.cs 文件。This code example is part of the Workflow Monitor SDK Sample from the DesignerGlyphProvider.cs file. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [工作流监视器](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.5/ms741706(v=vs.90))。For more information, see [Workflow Monitor](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.5/ms741706(v=vs.90)). [!code-csharp[WF_Samples#130](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/cs/snippets1.cs#130)] [!code-vb[WF_Samples#130](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/wf_samples/vb/snippets1.vb#130)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerGlyphCollection GetGlyphs(class System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner activityDesigner) cil managed
Public Function GetGlyphs (activityDesigner As ActivityDesigner) As ActivityDesignerGlyphCollection

param.name: activityDesigner
param.span: 要检索其标志符号的 对象。

span.span: The object for which to retrieve the glyphs.

summary.span: 返回与指定活动设计器关联的标志符号的数组。

span.span: Returns an array of glyphs that are associated with the specified activity designer.

returns.span: 要在活动设计器上呈现的 对象的数组。

span.span: An array of objects to render to the activity designer.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何实现 方法，以便在活动设计器图面上绘制自定义标志符号对象。The following code example demonstrates how you can implement the method to draw custom glyph objects on an activity designer surface. 此代码示例摘自工作流监视器 SDK 示例中的 DesignerGlyphProvider.cs 文件。This code example is part of the Workflow Monitor SDK Sample from the DesignerGlyphProvider.cs file. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [工作流监视器](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.5/ms741706(v=vs.90))。For more information, see [Workflow Monitor](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-3.5/ms741706(v=vs.90)).
